answerText: No Longer at Ease[10] Chinua Achebe wrote No Longer at Ease as a sequel to this novel about Okonkwo's life in Umuofia.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 10 | 13 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel intends to marry the osu Clara Okeke. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Obi is caught accepting what he had decided was his last bribe.
